title: I can't get any better at this game, I'm so bad.
body: No matter how hard I try, I can't get better, I can't carry and I just keep losing until I drop back to Silver 5 again. I honestly don't know what to do, I've reached my peak and can't get any better, this is the best I can deliver and fuck gold and that Mao'Kai skin that I really want.

replies.body:
As a trash platinum, there are so many ways to climb up and get better. The only reason your stuck is because your too lazy to figure out how to climb. 
Here's a video for you to improve and take it to heart. This guy explains how to get better and banishes every excuse a low elo player gives, giving you the strong mindset needed to deal with rank. If you can't take the insults and listen openly to his advice then you don't have the mental strength to even touch rank. 
Hope it helps :)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w2wCGpugcRw

I feel the statement that everyone has the potential to reach higher elo is bullcrap because I've managed to miss a warwick ult before and I mean if you can't even land a warwick ult, you should probably uninstall.

Oh I've been there :P Maybe not with a WW ult but certainly with other "this is not a skill shot how the hell can you miss you potato" kinda deals (Lulu E is a big offender being both ally and enemy castable).

Idk man, the lowest elo i was in was bronze 1 where everyone said i would keep dropping. But i said f them, and got back to silver the next day. Everyone has the potential to be high elo, but people have different learning speeds. I had to go from a silver 5 who built 2 Warden's Mail every game to a guy who still sucks at the game, but not as hard. You just need to care about climbing
I watch danyon as well and I've improved a lot
Oh sweet, thanks for this. I've heard about some of the stuff he said but haven't got an in-depth explanation on this. Cheers!

you should start playing with dyna q 

Every ranked game i have played since starting ranked (21 games) has had at least 1 dyna q on either side.
Dyna q isn't likely to improve your own gameplay tho, just be a tool which you use in hopes of being carried
If u want i can mentor u for a bit :3 its not hard once u understand what youre bad at and focus on it

I watched a youtube from Nightblue3, on of his video spectating a silver 4 kha'zix jungle. I used this video as a guide to how to jungle clear faster and sustain well in the jungle. although its before season 5 update where they removed mana pot, but if u have a role of JUNGLE then he should be good to watch and evaluate on what he explains.

Dude, stop playing ranked. Enjoy Normals and try and get better. You will just sink others in Ranked, which is really selfish.

Normals is far less stressful and you really find your groove because you're far more relaxed. Then, take what you've learnt into Ranked later.

> No matter how hard I try, I can&#039;t get better, I can&#039;t carry and I just keep losing until I drop back to Silver 5 again. I honestly don&#039;t know what to do, I&#039;ve reached my peak and can&#039;t get any better, this is the best I can deliver and fuck gold and that Mao&#039;Kai skin that I really want.

1) Stop trying to carry ... remove that burden from your mindset and start trying to just "play better than your counterpart in the opposing team". If you do that in EVERY game, you will rise and improve.
2) in every scenario change your focus from "how to get a kill", to "how to get an objective"
3) stop trying to take kills, focus on farming instead  ( [you are not bad at it](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=xDarkRavenx), but you are very inconsistent about it, as if farming is an afterthough for your playstyle  )
4) never enter fights which you might end up dying ... make surviving and defending your top priority and let your opponents rush to make a mistake instead
5) Spam the champions you are actually good at ... you have 86% win ratio with Ashe and you play Jinx .?. Why .?. You have 63% win ratio with your main Ahri and you pick orianna .?. Why .?.
